name: Flames of Oblivion
description: Activate an aura of flames which launches a fireball at 3 enemies every 5 seconds, dealing 1799 Flame Damage.  While slotted, you gain Major Prophecy and Savagery, increasing your Spell and Weapon Critical rating by 2629.
effectLines: Now launches three fireballs instead of one.
coefDescription: Activate an aura of flames which launches a fireball at 3 enemies every 5 seconds, dealing $1 Flame Damage.  While slotted, you gain Major Prophecy and Savagery, increasing your Spell and Weapon Critical rating by 2629.
